chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 has a problem:
It came with the charger, but the charger doesn't work
Thanks,

Hello ecomobile, 

My name is Angie, nice to meet you! I hope this message finds you amazing.

We hope you’re doing well. We’re reaching out to let you know that the charging cable that your customer Sara ordered is defective.

Please ship a replacement accessory within 48 hours and send us the tracking number. 
If you don’t have the item in stock, or can’t ship it in the next 48 hours, we’ll give them a goodwill gesture of 10 €at your expense as stated in our Quality Charter. 

Please note that the new accessory should be delivered to the customer within 5 business days and that the shipment should be tracked, as per the Quality Charter.

Thanks for taking care of this,
Angie, Back Market Customer Care.

Dear BackCare,

We are willing to offer the customer a commercial gesture for this inconvenience with respect to the amount stated at the Quality Charter of 10 euros.
Thank you.

Regards,
CH
